channel.title: Presentations on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Presentations on Damien Saunders

item.title: A couple more examples of impressive jQuery and JS
item.description: jQuery and Javascript may not be all that bad for you .. or your website. Recently I’ve been looking into fluid and responsive layouts for web design and I’ve been using a jQuery framework called Isotope on my blog page. Isotope looks like it can do magical things. If only I had the time to make it work properly. So here are two more impressive examples of what you can do with .

item.title: Mailchimp makes e-mail marketing easy
item.description: ** Mailchimp** makes **e-mail marketing** easy – this Practical Guide will show you a process to follow to send your first e-mail marketing campaign. This Practical Guide will help you to understand lists, campaigns, templates and more … My latest presentation is for anyone who has already decided to use Mailchimp.
